Job Description: WHO WE ARE  We are Power Factors, developer of the world??s leading cloud platform for renewable energy companies. Our SaaS platform, Drive, is used to manage over 25 Gigawatts of renewable energy across the planet (enough to power approximately 1.5 million homes). We??re tackling one of the world??s most important challenges in making renewable energy the world??s leading source of power by driving down the cost to operate wind and solar power plants. Our company is going through accelerated growth fueled by the unprecedented transition to clean, renewable energy.  The Drive platform continues to extend throughout the renewable energy market. Our platform collects millions of IoT and other data points, cleanses the data, detects occurring issues, identifies leading indicators to predict future issues, and adds a full advanced analytic capability on top of this rich, high-value dataset. In addition to issue detection and analytics, Drive adds the toolsets needs to take analytic insights to action such as case management and work order management.  To our customers, we deliver excellent customer service and a high-value system of engagement that provides the results they are looking for: lower operations costs and higher output from their renewable energy power plants. We are an agile development company, big enough to make an impact, but small enough to move quickly to execute in a growing industry and take advantage of rapidly evolving technology. To our employees, we provide a culture that values respect, teamwork, transparency, and achievement.  THE ROLE  Power Factors is seeking a qualified candidate to join our Company in the role of Data Analyst, Customer Success. In this role, you will be responsible for the design, development, and implementation of tools that aims at automating tasks and optimize processes and increase efficiency. More precisely, you will write scripts and develop helper applications to automate repetitive tasks. You will work on identifying new process improvement opportunities, tracking the most important metrics to diagnose problems, develop and tool filter and categorize issues and prioritize cases . Ultimately, you will ensure the workflows, reports, and tools implemented are constantly improving the level of service of the Customer Success Department.  In this role, you will report to the Helpdesk Manager based in Carmona Cavite, Philippines. Although this position is based out of our office located in Silang Cavite, you will be allowed to work remotely from home in the Philippines during the application of our COVID19 confinement period that is currently in force.  IMPORTANT NOTE: Power Factors is applying COVID-19 preventive measures to safeguard the health and safety of our employees, customers, business partners, and communities where we have offices. Please note that the selected candidate will be working from home for the duration of said applicable measures.  RESPONSIBILITIES  Design, develop, and implement tools and applications for the Customer Success Helpdesk team to automate repetitive tasks; Independently take a project from idea to functional application; Work in partnership with Helpdesk teams to gather, process, and interpret Case information and workflows to formulate Business Impact Analysis; Support with broader ticket analysis. report writing and presenting findings and propose workflow solutions; Translate business requirements into well-designed solution tools that best leverage our platform; Interpreting data, analyzing results using statistical techniques; Work with management to prioritize business and information needs. Identify, propose, and actively participate in process improvement and other projects as required.  REQUIREMENTS  Bachelor??s in software engineering or college technical degree in a related field; Minimum of 5 years of significant experience working as a Data Analyst / Data scientist / Business Data Analyst in a software company: Strong knowledge of analytics tools and processes; Strong understanding of reporting packages/spreadsheet tools (Microsoft Power BI), databases (querying and scripting in SQL. etc), programming (Python, PowerShell, JavaScript or related languages); Good working knowledge with OSISoft??s PI system, SQL, Salesforce, and Microsoft Power BI is beneficial; Familiar with cloud-based technologies Azure, AWS, & Rackspace;  ITIL / Lean-Six Sigma certification is considered an asset.  KEY COMPETENCIES  Accountability  Agility Effective Communication Critical Thinking Problem Analysis Process Development Project Management Decision Making/ Judgement  EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER  Power Factors is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to engaging a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive culture. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or veteran status. Job Title: GDS MST- Batch Reporting & Data Analyst (Senior Associate)
Job Description: Program Mercury is a large, multi-year, enterprise-wide process transformation that will replace more than 1400 EY business systems and related processes with an integrated, SAP centric platform that will standardize and harmonize activities throughout the organization and significantly improve how EY manages its business. Program Mercury is a key enabler of EY??s Vision 2020, directly supporting the efforts of a number of transformation initiatives across the Firm by streamlining the application portfolio, reducing operating costs and providing a platform to deliver services more efficiently. Program Mercury is currently in preparation of delivery of several deployments globally.  The opportunity  As an organization jointly owned by the business and IT, the Mercury Support Technology is a centralized and global organization which will provide operational support for the delivered Mercury solution and manage and support the Mercury user community. The MST will play an integral role in governance of the Mercury solution and the global template from both a business and IT perspective and will evolve to work closely with the business in enabling the benefit and value to be realized from the investment in Program Mercury and to set the future direction and technology road map to support Vision 2020.  Your key responsibilities  The MST Batch Reporting & Data Analyst will be the secondary point of contact in their time zone and support from Batch Operations for SAP across all weekends, month end and year end closes. Your role will be the preparation, communication, support and coordination to ensure we are tracking to task and understanding and communicating any business impacts if there are any issues or delays across weekend processing. The primarily role is to be available throughout the weekend as the secondary point of contact for the MST Batch Operations Team. It is expected of you to respond quickly and knowledgeably to batch processing related support, reporting and schedule requests in production (secondary in lower environments e.g. QA). You will be working with the MST Batch Reporting & Data Analyst Lead and teams across EYTech and Workload Automation to monitor system alerts, interfaces and batch jobs and helping to resolve incidents in production and lower environments where appropriate. Part of the role will include working with our automation team and being experienced at using the Control-M tool to analyse and schedule jobs. We will also look for your expertise in providing trend analysis on job performance and runtimes, data analysis and produce end to end daily batch production report summary for each pass across the weekend.  Skills and attributes for success  Adopting a logical and organized approach to problem resolution.  Ability to clearly articulate both problems and proposed solutions  Proactive approach to identifying issues and presenting solutions and options.  Analysing batch within SAP production and non-production environments and analysing control-M data, batch requirements and design  Ensuring the batch runbook is maintained and managed correctly. Assist in the completion of a robust runbook that optimizes support needs across various teams.  Working and teaming effectively with IT Services groups and other management personnel including on a global, virtual basis  To qualify for the role you must have  Bachelor??s Degree in Computer Science or relative proven experience with Batch reporting  Minimum of 3 years of solid experience in SAP batch reporting.  Excellent interpersonal, communication, and organizational skills - must be able to communicate fluently in English both verbally and in writing.  Experience working with SAP, Control-M, Change Management ChaRM, Solution Manager and ServiceNow or other workload automation tools.  Experience in reporting, management and review of batch processing and various technical activities for SAP.  Experience in managing of processing of data reporting that is happening for the system  Ability to facilitate design and requirement gathering discussions for batch scheduling.  Very good understanding of the customer strategy, services and business processes where it applies to batch processing.  looking for someone with batch management  Experience in Splunk tool for dash board analysis.  Provide quality metrics and reporting to promote compliance.  Experience in defining Process Models, Process Flows, Escalation Paths, Review Analytics and RACI development.  Complete Impact Assessments and have the ability to identify and manage Risks/Issues.  Experience with working with incident and problem team to resolve issues.  Experience with dealing with Operations and Service Support teams.  Experience across packaged and bespoke systems and infrastructure, ideally on an international basis.  Experience of Service management techniques gained through IT program/project delivery and in an IT support environment.  Ideally, you??ll also have  Ability to navigate through various OS systems and execute scripts (Windows , Unix and Linux, Oracle/ SQLPlus)  IT background with experience across the SAP development life cycle with experience in different project phases.  Understanding of business processes and finance workflow is preferable.  Track record of dealing with Executive Leadership  Experience in PowerBI  Experience in ServiceNow or worked with any ticketing tool  Knowledge with Windows , Unix and Linux, Oracle/ SQLPlus  Experience working within 3rd party vendors or being the vendor.  SAP certification  Project management certification  What we look for  We are looking for a self-starter, independent-thinker, curious and creative person with ambition and passion. We are looking for a high performer who can Builds successful partnership and persuades and influences internal and external stakeholders across diverse disciplines to promote engagement with the program and get stakeholder buy-in.  What working at EY offers  Support, coaching and feedback from some of the most engaging colleagues around  Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career  The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that??s right for you  About EY  As a global leader in assurance, tax, transaction and advisory services, we??re using the finance products, expertise and systems we??ve developed to build a better working world. That starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities and creative freedom to make things better. Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime. And with a commitment to hiring and developing the most passionate people, we??ll make our ambition to be the best employer by 2020 a reality.  If you can confidently demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.  Make your mark.  Apply now.

Location Makati  TERMS  Contractual  Day Shift  System / Data Analyst  Seeking an IT professional with 6 years plus working as an System / Data Analyst, preferably with a banking or financial client.  Our banking client requires to migrate 1,200 servers, 300 applications and 200 databases from an existing Data Centre to a new Data Centre.  The PTS scope of work will be to review and verify the accuracy of a large manual database of all assets / locations, applications, databases, operating systems, storage and network and then to Identify a dependency matrix of service groupings with banks business units and identify priority of service groupings against criticality. The output of this matrix will enable the client to make sure that when a specific application is migrated that all of the associated elements of databases, storage, network, circuits etc. are understood so that during the move weekend that nothing is left behind which would invalidate a successful migration. Additionally a number of applications will need to be assessed against suitability for re-platforming on an existing virtual private cloud so to reduce the number of legacy servers during the migration.  The applications are across all platforms including Linux, Wintel, Solaris, Unix, AS400 etc. but note that the candidate does not need to be an expert in all platforms but have confidence and an understand when discussing with the client applications teams and the business.  The candidate will assist and support 2 x PTS Server / Application Migration Subject Matter Experts in collating data and information so to derive decisions on which applications are migrated to the public cloud, private cloud or migrate as a ??bare metal server??. The collation of data and information will also enable the interdependencies to be recognised so enabling the creation a migration run books that minimise risk.  Reporting Lines  The resource will report to the local PTS Architect PM and will work extensively with the Regional PTS DC Centre of Excellence Team (located in Australia) as the project owners and the local client.  Location  The location of work will be in Makati and the hours of work will be 8 hours a day 5 days a week with occasional weekend work. The candidate will be provided with a laptop but will provide their own mobile phone. Travel to and from work is included within the salary package.  Duration & Start Date  To start in August 2020 and run for 6 months with probable extension for a further 12 months if the candidate proves value to the client.  Interested candidates may send their resumes to info@joeriley.com.ph. or Call us at +63 917 8629986 | (02) 571-8052

The main objective of this engagement is to assist the company??s Office of Risk Management (ORM) in performing credit risk data management and ensuring the data is ready for use by Credit Risk Management System (CRMS) and other ORM??s applications and tools for various risk analysis and risk management reporting purposes.  SCOPE OF WORK The analyst will be responsible to work with data owners, system owners, users, OIST infrastructure and solution delivery team, and other relevant parties in identifying data requirements for risk management systems/tools of ORM, including a 3rd-party package solution CRMS (Moody??s RiskOrigins). The analyst will gather the required data from various data sources, analyze data, and conduct data cleansing based on data validated by data owners or system owners/users. He/she will also develop risk management reports and provide support for resolving data related issues with risk management systems/tools of ORM. The contractor will work under the supervision of and report to OIST Solution Delivery Unit. He/she will work closely with ORM.  DETAILED TASKS AND/OR EXPECTED OUTPUTS Perform data management of data used for risk data analysis and risk management reports in ORM, including but not limited to:  Data analysis; Design and develop relational databases; Data design/modelling and mapping; Data import/migration and transformation; Data cleansing; Design and build data input or data collection screens; Design and develop risk reports using Moody??s RiskOrigins Application, and (or) the company??s standard reporting tools such as Cognos. MINIMUM QUALIFICATION REQUIREMENTS  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Finance or a related field.  Seven years working experience in technology, information management, relational database design and development, business intelligence, data mining or statistics.  Three years or more working experience with credit risk management related business process and data is highly desirable.  Exposure using the following programming languages/databases/application/approach/tools:  Data warehousing. Oracle database, Oracle PL/SQL, MySQL, SQL Server, MS Access. Crystal Report. Advanced Excel functionalities. Visual Basic, VBA.

Job Title: Supply Chain Data Scientist (BI and Analytics)
Job Description:
Job Description
Supply Chain Data Scientist (BI and Analytics)
Agilent inspires and supports discoveries that advance the quality of life. We provide life science, diagnostic and applied market laboratories worldwide with instruments, services, consumables, applications and expertise. Agilent enables customers to gain the answers and insights they seek -- so they can do what they do best: improve the world around us. Information about Agilent is available at www.agilent.com.

We are looking for a highly motivated and dedicated team member to be part of our Strategic Business Data Analytics function. This function is part of the Global Supply Chain and Logistics organization. The role entails high frequency engagements with senior management and working level team members, therefore, offers a great opportunity for candidates to gain knowledge and perspective of business at multiple levels.

Job Description
Review, analyze and interpret business data and information needs for the end to end supply chain processes
Analyze complex problems, interpret operational needs, and develop creative & innovative solutions involving data model design/ reporting assembly/ application structure.
Perform data analysis and present analysis findings for improvement opportunities
Propose optimal solutions for gaps identified by examining and re-engineering operations and procedures, formulate policy, develop, and implement new strategies and procedures.
Lead and manage data solutions projects with cross functional teams.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs and define roadmap, produce ROI analysis, budgets for project execution, and deployment plans.
Produce quality presentations to senior management, recommend concise actionable insights from analysis.
Requirements
Bachelor's or Master's Degree or University Degree or equivalent with minimum of 5+ years relevant experience
Possess knowledge of data modeling or database design such as table relationships, simple query and reporting skills. Hands-on experience with designing SQL queries and optimizing performance
Strong proficiency in MS OFFICE tools such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint
Experience in supply chain, procurement and logistics operations will be desirable.
Familiarity with operation research concepts and statistical inference techniques.
Understand key financial measures and metrics that have direct influence on end-to-end supply chain.
Able to work independently to source, verify, collate, prepare and analyze datasets from across the organization
Working knowledge on SAP system and experience with BI dashboard visualization software tools is an added advantage
Proven advanced verbal, written communication, able to articulate the key findings of the data / information and summarize into presentation form
Strong interpersonal skills -- crisp and passionate communicator
Self-motivated and passionate to make a difference with data
Agilent Technologies Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other protected categories under all applicable laws.

Noise is usually a big concern for city planning and city sustainable development. Before new designs, new urban planning, and new energy saving technologies/machines can be implemented, the noise issue must be fully evaluated along with other requirements.

We need to develop multi-physics modelling (structural vibration, noise, ventilation) to virtual evaluate the performance and optimize designs.

The research scientist is required to:

To analyse building vibration due to different sources.
To analyse and predict air-borne and structure-borne noise
To design, develop and optimize noise mitigation measures. 
Write technical reports, present research results at local/overseas conferences, and publish journal papers.

Job Title: Scientist (High Performance Computing), Computing & Intelligence, IHPC
Job Description:
Job Description
JOB DESCRIPTION


You will work in a highly passionate team on project under the collaborations between A*Star and industry partner. This project is investigating computing technologies and software to enable integrated web-based environment for High Performance Computing(HPC) and High Throughput Computing(HTC) where domain scientist defines problem to be solved and decisions about computational resource selection and scheduling are determined automatically.

The team is working closely with industry partners to develop an integrated framework system for HPC/HTC to provide integrated web-based environment for automatic scientific job submission and intelligent computational resource allocation. 

We are looking for talents like you to realize an integrated web-based environment for HPC/HTC management and develop intelligent HPC/HTC resource allocation mechanism through machine learning and AI recommendation models, fulfilling HPC/HTC applications requirements and multiple-objective optimizations in terms of performance, scalability and monetary cost.

As a member of the team, you will conduct foundational research on data pre-process and feature engineering, machine learning algorithm design and implementation for HPC/HTC resource allocation and prediction. In addition, you will lead engineers and mentor students to develop, deploy and evaluate machine learning based resource management in various application scenarios. 

JOB REQUIREMENTS

PhD in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent with proven research expertise
Have conducted impactful system research in one or more of the following areas: high performance computing, machine learning, parallel and distributed computing, storage, database, IoT and etc.
Good programming skills: multi-language (C++, C#, Java, Python, CUDA programming); network programming (TCP/IP Socket), parallel programming (multi-thread, OpenMP and MPI).

Job Description:
Job Description
JOB DESCRIPTION

IHPC is seeking a highly motivated research scientist to conduct research in first principles methods applied to structural materials. The new staff will be required to develop fundamental understanding of the mechanics of materials using a combination of theoretical analysis and numerical simulations. 

The successful candidate will be required to:

Perform first-principles simulations to investigate mechanical phenomena at the atomic scale
Work in a multidisciplinary environment to develop multiscale understanding of mechanical properties 
Write technical reports, present research results at local/overseas conferences, and publish journal papers
JOB REQUIREMENTS

Ph.D. in Computational Materials Science or related fields including Mechanical Engineering or Applied Physics.
Knowledge of continuum and structural mechanics
Strong background in crystallography
Expertise in physical metallurgy, especially with deformation mechanisms in metals (slip/twin/phase transformation), the theory of dislocations
Experience with first principles codes such as VASP and Quantum Espresso,
Programming skills, preferably in Fortran, Matlab and python
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Curiosity and motivation to solve challenging problems.
JOB DESCRIPTION

IHPC is seeking a highly motivated research scientist to conduct research in first principles methods applied to structural materials. The new staff will be required to develop fundamental understanding of the mechanics of materials using a combination of theoretical analysis and numerical simulations.

Perform first-principles simulations to investigate mechanical phenomena at the atomic scale
Work in a multidisciplinary environment to develop multiscale understanding of mechanical properties 
Write technical reports, present research results at local/overseas conferences, and publish journal papers
JOB REQUIREMENTS

Ph.D. in Computational Materials Science or related fields including Mechanical Engineering or Applied Physics.
Knowledge of continuum and structural mechanics
Strong background in crystallography
Expertise in physical metallurgy, especially with deformation mechanisms in metals (slip/twin/phase transformation), the theory of dislocations
Experience with first principles codes such as VASP and Quantum Espresso,
Programming skills, preferably in Fortran, Matlab and python
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Curiosity and motivation to solve challenging problems.

Job Description
Job Description

You will work in a highly passionate team on project under A*Star thematic programme. This project is investigating cutting-edge trusted computing technologies such as Federated Machine Learning, Secure Multi-party Computation and Blockchain to enable collaboration among different parties without compromising privacy. The team conducts research and development on trusted computing, and is actively collaborating with industry partners for use-case development.

We are looking for talents to conduct deep research on Federated machine learning, Multi-party computation and Blockchain, to realise trusted computing solutions through integrating, improving these cutting-edge technologies, as well as promoting trusted computing technologies through use-case development and deployment.

As a senior member of the team, you will co-lead a team of scientists and engineers, and mentor students to design, develop, deploy and evaluate trusted computing technologies in various application scenarios. 

Job Requirements

Qualification & Field of Study: PhD in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent with proven research expertise
Min. Years of Experience: Fresh PhD graduate with exceptional skill set and project experience may be considered
Other Requirements (e.g. Skills, Competencies):

??       Have conducted impactful research in one or more of the following areas: Federated Machine Learning, Secure Multi-party Computation, Blockchain, machine learning, parallel and distributed computing, etc.

??       Good programming skills: multi-language (C++, C#, Java, Python, CUDA programming); network programming (TCP/IP Socket).

??       Knowledge background and project experience on Federated Machine Learning, Secure Multi-party Computation, Blockchain platforms.

??       Candidates with hands-on experiences in computer system and network, Linux OS, virtualization platforms (e.g., Xen, KVM and Docker), cloud computing, distributed system are preferable.

??       Understanding of trusted computing applications and industry experience are preferable.

Job Scope

At least Bachelor Degree in IT/ Computer Science , or equivalent

Experience with Cloud environments such as AWS, GCP, Azure

Programming experience with SQL, Python, Java, Scala

Job Title: Research Engineer (Industrial IOT Innovation), Computing & Intelligence, IHPC
Job Description:
Job Description
JOB DESCRIPTION

You will work in a highly passionate team on some relevant projects under the collaborations between A*STAR and industry partners from aerospace, maritime, transport, healthcare, agri-food domains. These projects are investigating how blockchain technologies could enable data/model sharing to unlock the power of AI data science, and establish trust among different participants in the ecosystem.

The team is working closely with industry partners to develop some blockchain-based proof-of-concept prototypes for data/model sharing, product/asset tracking, workflow/business visibility and automatic management. We are looking for talents like you to make blockchain stand on the floor: working on market-driven promising use cases, enabling interoperability to physical and software systems, fulfilling industry requirements in terms of security, privacy, performance, scalability and cost efficiency.

As a member of the team, you will develop, deploy and evaluate blockchain-based prototypes in various application scenarios. In addition, you will also conduct solid researches on blockchain technology with the guidance of scientists.  

JOB REQUIREMENTS

Master/ Bachelor in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent with proven research expertise
Excellent programing skills and professional software development experience: multi-language (C++, C#, Java, Python, Go); network programming (TCP/IP Socket), parallel programming (multi-thread, OpenMP and MPI); Web-based interactive platform development
Candidates with hands-on experiences in computer architecture and network, Linux OS, virtualization platforms (e.g., Xen, KVM and Docker), distributed system and database are preferable
Knowledge on data security and privacy are preferable

Equipped with the latest data analytic and technological platform, they leverage big data to create unconventional data credit scoring. Aiming to focus on financial literacy, they have strong vision in technology and Data analytics to stay at the forefront of financial inclusion agenda year to year.

The role is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Open for remote work with occasional travel requirements to Jakarta.

  analysis

  designing infrastructure for larger scalability

  management etc.)

Job Description
The opportunity
EY's GDS IST and TTT team members work side-by-side with the firm's partners, clients and tax technical subject matter experts to develop and incorporate technology solutions that enhance value-add, improve efficiencies and enable our clients with disruptive and market leading tools supporting Tax. 
GDS IST and TTT team works closely with clients and professionals in the following areas: Federal Business Tax Services, Partnership Compliance, Corporate Compliance, Indirect Tax Services, Human Capital, and Internal Tax Services. GDS Tax Technology provides solution architecture, application development, testing and maintenance support to the global TAX service line both on a pro-active basis and in response to specific requests.
Your key responsibilities
As a Machine Learning Manager,  you will be involved in designing, development, testing and deployment of ML/ AI  solution. You??ll spend most of your time doing end to end coding using Python R, applying machine learning techniques to deliver actionable insights. You will be Applying standard statistical methods, Stimulation models and statistical programming as needed. You will also be responsible for model development- manipulation including data exploration, training data, feature extraction and model development, validation and scoring on structured and unstructured data and to highlight patterns, anomalies, relationship and trends. 
Skills and attributes for success
Designing and Building systems that mine massive datasets and structure/ engineer it to be usable for machine learning models and to apply AI/Machine Learning technology to solve real-world problems.
Developing a strong understanding of business requirements; working with business users/ business analysts to define probable solutions and present result in a clear and concise manner.
Effectively managing clients and stakeholders.
Mentoring team members in the use of machine learning.
To qualify for the role you must have
Bachelor??s Degree in Computer Science and alike
Overall 10 years of experience and hands on experience in Machine learning and artificial Intelligence Intelligence techniques and tools such as neural networks, deep learning, MS Azure Cognitive Service, regression, decision tree, random forest, classification and clustering, natural language processing (NLP), Natural Language Generation (NLG), ARIMA algorithms.
2-3 years of experience in people management.

Job Description
Our company is building a team to drive innovation around data monetization and analytics. We are seeking a Data Engineer (Developer), with broad technical skills to dive deep into the design and implementation of data pipelines and data management processes.
Here's the impact you'll make and what we'll accomplish together
You will be responsible for creating and maintaining the data (ETL) pipeline for the company's Insights Platform, and building the components required for optimal extraction, transformation, cost efficiency management and the loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using Cloud technologies. You will be working with stakeholders including Product, Cloud, Data Lake and Integration teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support the data engineering needs of the Compnay's Insights Product. You will be responsible for creating data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader.
What you can expect from the role
  *   Leverage existing and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture
  *   Build analytics capabilities that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights
  *   Work with cross functional technology stakeholders to build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and big data technologies.
  *   Re-design infrastructure for greater scalability.
  *   Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional/non-functional business requirements.
  *   Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements including establishing standards for development processes and technical requirements; automating manual processes; optimizing data delivery, etc.
  *   Develop and ensure compliance for data management processes, policies and standards.
  *   Implement and enforce controls to maintain data availability and quality.
  *   Recognize and adopt best practices in data integrity, test design, analysis, validation, and documentation.
  *   Tune application and query performance using profiling tools and SQL.
  *   Review data at aggregate levels on a regular basis using analytical reporting tools to support the identification of risks and data patterns or trends.
  *   Work closely with cross functional teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs.
  *   Keep up-to-date with the latest technology trends and methods by staying abreast of state-of-the-art literature in the fields of advanced analytics, statistical modeling, and data management.
Skills/Qualifications
  *   Demonstrated experience in ETL, and data warehousing
  *   Demonstrated ability to build and optimize 'big data' data pipelines, architectures and data sets and computing tools such as Spark, MySQL, GCP, Azure, AWS, etc.
  *   Demonstrated knowledge of methods and techniques involved in Advanced Analytics, data mining, statistics, and optimization
  *   Coding proficiency in at least one modern programming language (Python, Java, etc)
  *   Demonstrated proficiency working with both relational (SQL) and non-relational databases (NoSQL).
  *   Demonstrated understanding of data privacy, security and related tools such as anonymization and encryption.
  *   Excellent oral and written communication skills and ability to clearly and fluently translate technical findings to non-technical partners and to communicate to multiple audiences using data storytelling and through graphics.
  *   Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively in an interdisciplinary environment and to develop recommendations using facilitation and consensus building.
  *   Strong analytical, critical thinking, and evaluation skills to discern and help solve the important problems, while identifying new ways to leverage our data
You are the perfect fit if you have:
  *   Advanced expertise in Cloud, with Google Cloud Platform and BigQuery a strong asset, Dataflow and Composer
  *   Strong desire to work in a cross functional team environment
  *   Ability to think and solve complex data engineering problems in a maintainable and scalable fashion
  *   Desire to find new and better ways of doing things, generating original and imaginative ideas, products, and/or solutions
  *   Desire to embrace documentation creation & maintenance
  *   Ability to work independently and collaboratively with both local & non-local teammates
  *   Strong problem solving and organizational skills
  *   Impeccable written & oral communication skills with strong attention to detail
What we give back to you:
  *   Opportunity to show your stuff and be recognized and rewarded for excelling
  *   A dynamic and collaborative environment
  *   Opportunities for personal development through training, networking and career development
  *   An organization that actively supports you giving back to the community you live in
  *   A place that embraces our core values: Spirited teamwork, Courage to innovate, Embrace change and Initiate opportunity, and a Passion for growth
  *   Flexible work styles with the ability to work in and out of the office
Required Professional Designation/Certification:
University degree, preferably in Engineering, or Computer Science
Data Skills - General: ['data pipelines', 'data management', 'ETL', 'automating manual processes', 'optimizing data', 'data integrity', 'analysis', 'validation', 'data patterns', 'advanced analytics', 'statistical modeling', 'data warehousing', 'big data', 'architectures', 'data sets', 'data mining', 'statistics', 'Coding', 'relational databases', 'data storytelling']

Job Description:
Job Description
EY GDS ?? Consulting ?? Data Privacy Consultant
The opportunity
The Data Privacy Consultant will be primarily responsible for the development of data protection privacy strategies and roadmaps and performing PIA, DPIA and Data mapping. The main duties of the person in this role is to deliver various Data Privacy regulations and Privacy concepts. This person will interface with IT Operations, Network Operations, Infrastructure teams, Legal, Risk Management, etc.
Skills and attributes for success
Good knowledge of TCP/IP, concepts of OSI layer and protocols, networking and security concepts.
Strong knowledge of cyber / information security concepts, risk and controls concepts.
Experience in responding to Data Privacy Request for Proposals (RFPs).
Candidate should remain abreast of the industry trends and updated on Data Privacy standards, regulations and related technologies.
Good Understanding of Risk Assessment Frameworks.
Candidate should be able to prioritize tasks and work accurately under pressure in order to meet deadlines.
Excellent documentation and communication skills.
Foster teamwork and lead by example.
Training and mentoring of project resources.
Participating in the organization-wide people initiatives.

To qualify for the role, you must have
Bachelor of Technology (BE/B.Tech), M.Tech or ME in Computer Science, MCA or equivalent.
Work Experience: 3 to 4 years
Thorough understanding of various Data privacy regulations and privacy concepts (for e.g. GDPR, CCPA etc.)
Strong knowledge of standards such as ISO 27001/2, ISO 22301, ISO 27018, PCI ?? DSS, NIST standards on Cyber Security, HIPAA, HITRUST, etc.
Experience in performing PIA, DPIA and Data mapping etc. At least 3 years of experience in Privacy domain.
Experience in developing data protection privacy strategies and roadmaps.
Experience in planning and implementation of data protection and privacy controls.
Experience in creating Data privacy related training content and imparting cross functional training on Data Privacy.
Ideally, you??ll also have
Certifications related to Data Privacy such as CIPP, CIPM and/or ISO 27001 Lead Auditor and Lead Implementer, CISSP, CISA, CISM, CEH, etc.
Functional and non-functional privacy requirements definition and documentation experience.
What we look for
A Team of people with commercial acumen, technical experience and enthusiasm to learn new things in this fast-moving environment with consulting skills.
An opportunity to be a part of market-leading, multi-disciplinary team of 1400 + professionals, in the only integrated global transaction business worldwide.
Opportunities to work with EY Consulting practices globally with leading businesses across a range of industries.
What working at EY offers
At EY, we??re dedicated to helping our clients, from start??ups to Fortune 500 companies ?? and the work we do with them is as varied as they are.
You get to work with inspiring and meaningful projects. Our focus is education and coaching alongside practical experience to ensure your personal development. We value our employees and you will be able to control your own development with an individual progression plan. You will quickly grow into a responsible role with challenging and stimulating assignments.
Moreover, you will be part of an interdisciplinary environment that emphasizes high quality and knowledge exchange. Plus, we offer:
Support, coaching and feedback from some of the most engaging colleagues around.
Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career.
The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that??s right for you.

About EY
As a global leader in Assurance, Tax, Strategy & transactions and Consulting services, we??re using the finance products, expertise and systems we??ve developed to build a better working world. That starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities and creative freedom to make things better. Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime. And with a commitment to hiring and developing the most passionate people, we??ll make our ambition to be the best employer by 2020 a reality.
If you can confidently demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.
Join us in building a better working world. 

Apply now.

Company Overview
JG Summit Holdings, Inc. is one of the leading companies in the Philippines with business interests in: Air Transportation, Banking, Food Manufacturing, Hotels, Petrochemicals, Power Generation, Real Estate and Property Development, and Telecommunications.

The business of JG Summit started in 1957 when Universal Corn Products, Inc. (now Universal Robina Corporation) was established to operate a cornstarch plant in Manila. Since then, JG Summit has pioneered breakthroughs, broadened its enterprise and stayed at the forefront in every phase of the country's rise to development.

JG Summit has six (6) core businesses: branded consumer, agro-industrial and commodity food products in Universal Robina Corporation; real estate and hotels in Robinsons Land Corporation and United Industrial Corporation (Singapore); telecommunications and internet in Digital Telecommunications Phils., Inc.; petrochemicals in JG Summit Petrochemicals Corporation; air transportation in Cebu Pacific Air; and financial services in Robinsons Savings Bank and JG Summit Capital Services Corporation.

JG Summit's place in Philippine business has for its cornerstone a business portfolio of market leaders, a solid financial position, a formidable management team, and a vision of leading the country to global competitiveness and making life better for every Filipino.

Job Title: Senior Big Data ETL Integration Engineer
Job Description:
Job Description
Here at Macquarie, we are putting our customers first and changing how the world interacts with banks. We understand that banking in the future will be predominantly digital and so we??re building our platforms from the ground up to match. We use technology as a catalyst to bring people together and help them realise their life ambitions through our products and solutions, which are designed by humans for humans.
The Role
We are searching for a Big Data Integration Engineer to join our team and play a lead role in our data transformation projects. In this role, you will help us define and drive Big Data and Talend ETL standards and best practices across our teams. You will design and implement ETL frameworks and various metadata-driven reusable components. You will have end-to-end accountability for developing, deploying, and supporting our data assets. Additionally, you will help grow your teams?? technical expertise and stay abreast of new technologies and practices to enhance team capabilities and skills further.
Qualifications
Successfully delivered a project, with experience working in Agile and DevOps environment
Proficient oral and written communications skills
Dedicated, adaptable and able to quickly understand new concepts and apply them correctly
Independent worker with effective interpersonal skills including mentoring, coaching, and team building
Highly proficient in at least two of the following:
             *Talend ETL toolset (ideally both Talend Data Integration and Talend Big Data editions)
             *Data warehousing with emphasis on the Information Management domain
             *Big Data technologies such as Hive, Spark, Presto, AirFlow, general purpose storage (HDFS, S3, BLOB) and other Hadoop / Apache tools
Experience in Data modelling using Data Vault 2.0 methodology will be highly appreciated
Knowledge of different Spark-based PaaS solutions like EMR or DataBricks as well as programming languages like Scala or Python will be additional advantage
Knowledge of CI/CD and code coverage analytical tools
Familiarity with at least one cloud platform, preferably AWS or GCP
Familiarity with configuration management tools and containerization technologies
Familiarity with security/vulnerability tools
Familiarity with monitoring tools

What??s in it for you
Our work environment is modern and inclusive with a strong focus on employee experience 
You??ll be part of a team that deeply values diversity and creates space for you to be your best
You'll have flexible working options, including working from home 
You??ll have opportunities to experiment and test your own ideas to see where they can lead
We support ongoing professional development and technical certifications to help you develop your knowledge and skills
About Banking and Financial Services  
Banking and Financial Services is Macquarie??s retail banking and financial services business, providing a diverse range of personal banking, wealth management, business banking and vehicle finance products and services to retail clients, advisers, brokers and business clients.  
Our commitment to Diversity and Inclusion 
Macquarie understands the importance of diversity and inclusion - our long history of success has come from being different. At Macquarie we value the innovation and creativity that diversity of thought brings. The one thing we all have in common is our focus on high performance. If you're capable, motivated and can deliver, we want you on our team.
We recognise that flexibility comes in a variety of forms. Talk to us about what flexibility you need.
Data Skills - Specific: ['Talend ETL', 'Agile', 'Talend', 'ETL', 'Talend Data Integration', 'Talend Big Data editions', 'Hive', 'Spark', 'Presto', 'AirFlow', 'HDFS', 'S3', 'BLOB', 'Hadoop', 'Apache', 'DataBricks', 'Scala', 'Python', 'CI/CD', 'AWS', 'GCP']

Accenture??s culture of equality nurtures innovation. We are committed to achieving a gender balanced workforce by 2025. Be part of the future workforce. Join us!

Job Description
Founded in 2011, Willow is a global technology start up moving rapidly into it's next stage of growth. We are harnessing the true potential of data to transform disconnected built assets into living, learning, and evolving digital twins.
Ranked in Linked In's 2018 Australian "Top 25 Startups", you will be joining a team of performance driven individuals, backed by the most advanced technology the built world has ever seen. We are chartering a new course, Digital First, the Willow Way. Our 'Willow World' is fast paced, nurturing and collaborative.
Willow Inc.
Willow is a global technology company with offices in Sydney, Melbourne, Manila, New York, Seattle, Charlotte, London and Tel Aviv.
Willow delivers a software platform, WillowTwin?? and professional services, WillowDigital?? to accelerate digital adoption. These distinct, but related parts of our business work together to guide, build and manage the journey to smart buildings and infrastructure networks, at a project and portfolio level.
WillowTwin?? is a ground-breaking software platform that re-imagines the digital twin for the built world. Our platform integrates, analyses and manages data at scale, delivering insights to improve performance and experience of buildings and infrastructure networks.
WillowDigital?? delivers digital engineering and architecture services to customers. Our team understands the processes required to harness the technology of today, innovation of tomorrow and unlock the power of data within the portfolios of both buildings and infrastructure networks.
We are seeking an MEP Modeller who will be part of an integrated team performing modelling of building (MEP) services and will involve providing BIM production services using Revit MEP. As part of the Architecture / Digital Engineering team, he/she will work directly with the Principal & Revit BIM Lead Global to successfully deliver projects across Australia, North America and Asia.
Responsibilities
Production of services models as requested
Liaison and coordination with Client??s engineers on production of drawings
Co-ordination with other services within internal teams and external third parties
Compliance with all QA procedures and guidelines
Completing Client review meetings
MEP family development
Qualifications
Engineering focused qualification
3+ years?? experience in:
Building Services Modelling using Revit MEP
Design Consultants drawing experience (and/or) Contractors Construction drawing experience
active projects producing construction documents using Revit MEP
Building services coordination using Navisworks
Experience in Site, Design consultancy and understanding of the practical build-ability of MEP (Mechanical, Electrical and Plumbing) services for design modelling detailing and presentation of drawing Design purposes.
Understanding of LOD??s (level of development) and modelling requirements for the respective levels to be achieved and what should be included in each stage of project.
It is also beneficial if you have:
an understanding of manufacturing processes and construction methods;
a good knowledge of engineering design principles and MEP production; and /or
experience with duct systems, electrical, plumbing, and piping layouts and designs.
Software Requirements (Essential)
Autodesk Revit
Navisworks
If you are eager to work in a fast paced, high growth tech start up based on collaboration and open communication, then Willow could be the place for you. We at Willow never give up, we work smart, we care about our fellow human beings, and we always put our best foot forward.
Together we can build a brighter future for the built world - A world of curated journeys and personalised experiences.
To find out more, visit the website: https://www.willowinc.com

Company: TeleTech Customer Care Management Phils., Inc.
Job Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a candidate to join our Strategic Analytics group. This position will work with our internal client teams to both analyze and visualize structured and unstructured data.  The successful candidate will possess a keen analytic mind as well as a flair for visual design.

This position will assist in the analyses of large-scale client databases, including customer profiling, segmentation studies, post-program measurement, and other ad-hoc projects.  Candidates should have solid experience evaluating large amounts of consumer data and culling out key insights to support data-driven marketing opportunities, along with a background in fundamental statistical concepts.
The candidate will also play a key role in creating visually stunning and effective data visualizations and dashboards.   They should be skilled at converting raw data into an interactive image or design that tells a compelling story and aids business decision-making.
Primary Responsibilities
Assist in the design, day-to-day management and delivery of client analyses and data visualizations
Collaborate & communicate effectively with client and internal teams to identify analytic objectives and approach
Document business and functional requirements for dashboards
Develop analytic plans (including sampling plans and programming specs)
Extract data from client systems and write programming code required to clean, transform, analyze and visualize the resulting datasets
QC programming output
Ensure that client deliverables are produced on time and error-free
Stay up to date with the data visualization marketplace and new product developments and features
Participate in product training and client demos as needed
Utilize speech and text mining tools to uncover actionable customer insights
Qualifications / Experience
2+ years of experience in marketing analysis, database marketing, or business intelligence roles, ideally across marketing, CX and VoC business functions
Demonstrated ability to develop and interpret analytic output
Proven ability to create data visualizations that are well designed and tell a compelling visual story
Strong attention to detail
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Comfortable working in a team-oriented, deadline driven environment
Self-starter, self-educating and self-motivated with an insatiable curiosity
Manage personal tasks & workload with ability to prioritize and multitask
Knowledge of basic statistical concepts; a working knowledge of multivariate statistics (i.e., regression, cluster analysis, CHAID, etc.) would be helpful.
Deep experience using data extraction and analysis tools, such as SQL, Python, or R and data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI is required.
Working knowledge of unstructured data analysis tools is a plus
Business, economics, or quantitative methods background preferable.  Graduate degree is a plus.
Data Skills - General: ['customer profiling', 'segmentation studies', 'fundamental statistical concepts', 'data visualizations', 'dashboards', 'clean, transform', 'data visualization', 'text mining', 'marketing analysis', 'database marketing', 'business intelligence roles', 'multivariate statistics', 'regression', 'cluster analysis', 'CHAID', 'data extraction']

Job Description:
Job Description
Satellite Office is partnered with one of the biggest logistic/freight company in Australia.
The client the we have is now looking for an experienced, passionate and motivated Senior Full Stack developer to play a key part in our team.
This role is for you if you:
Create elegant front end user experiences
Enjoy engaging with customers and non-technical teammates to analyse and solve their requirements
Like working in fast paced environments
Are as comfortable working on the back-end as the front-end
Love having responsibility for delivering solutions from beginning to end
To be successful in this role you will be able to demonstrate that you:
Are an expert in front-end software development technologies such as HTML, CSS and Javascript/JQuery
Have advanced level knowledge of Java, including Spring MVC and Hibernate (this is non-negotiable)
Have at least 8 years experience developing web applications (front and back end) and APIs in Java J2EE using Spring MVC and Hibernate, along with JavaScript/JQuery.
Are experience working with technical and non-technical stakeholders to analyse a requirement and then deliver the solution.
Have the ability to provide accurate estimates of the effort involved in delivering a solution including proactively identifying ways to reduce this.
Have the ability to carefully consider a problem, propose a solution, implement it and test your code.
Have AWS experience, including Elastic Beanstalk, RDS, S3, SNS, Lambda, SQS, API Gateway.
Are experience in integrating with third party applications via APIs - this is especially important for growth activities where we might be pushing user information to another (e.g. CRM) application to carry out marketing/tracking etc.
Personal Attributes and Prior Experience
We are seeking someone who is great at communicating with developers and team members in addition to being a hands on developer.
Prior experience developing software in a startup or small company/team is essential.
Very high level of spoken and written English.
Enjoy getting involved in creating some processes (e.g. Agile)
Able to identify and apply existing libraries and frameworks that can speed up development
Experience in developing and mentoring a team is a plus.
The technical skills we need are:
Strong front end software development credentials
Extensive Full Stack Development experience using Java, Spring, Spring MVC, Hibernate, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery.
Strong knowledge of producing and consuming REST APIs.
Experience with Atlassian tools including JIRA and Bitbucket
Demonstrated experience in embedding machine learning algorithms into software solutions or collaborating with data scientists to create ??intelligent? software
React and any other tech like this would be nice to have

Job Title: Full Stack Developer -Digital & Learning Experience Platforms
Job Description:
Job Description
Full Stack Developer (Node React and/or NextJS, AWS.)
Purpose
Will be responsible for translating business and functional requirements into concrete deliverables with the design, development, testing, and deployment of highly scalable distributed services. This full-Stack engineer should have experience working with multiple backend and frontend languages and frameworks and proficiency in working with new learning new technologies.
Work to be performed
1. Act as the senior developer for development activity, focussing on the LXP development and prototypes:
2. Act as a code reviewer and make necessary upgrades to the code.
3. In foundational phase, 100% contribution in developing the infrastructure for Learning experience platform.
4. Work with the process owner, subject matter experts and others as necessary to determine the as-is and to-be state of specific business requirements.
5. Incorporate feedback from stakeholder groups and Develop LXP.
6. Build the core and support systems for learning platform and develop features
7. Maintenance of the core and support systems by constantly updating the source codes and allied repositories.
8. Coordinate with external & internal partners as required to understand business requirements, plan and implement tasks required for the development of LXP.
9. Designing, developing and maintaining core system features, services and engines
10. Helping define product features, drive the system architecture, and spearhead the best practices that enable a quality product
11. Working with scientists and other engineers to investigate design approaches, prototype new technology, and evaluate technical feasibility
12. Operating in an Agile/Scrum environment to deliver high quality software against aggressive schedules.
13. Guide junior members of the team and assist them with design, development, test and implementation.
14. Own the overall assigned features and products.
Knowledge and Skills
?? Experience in Node React and/or NextJS, AWS.
?? Experience using one of the following: Python / Django, Ruby / Rails, PHP / Laravel or GoLang
?? Data modelling experience with relational databases like MySQL and/or Postgres.
?? Experience designing Rest APIs and/or GraphQL APIs
?? Experience architecting and building scalable web applications
?? Experience working with both monoliths and microservices and the ability to make the right tradeoff calls
?? Experience with background job queueing/processing systems, like Resque, Sidekiq or Celery
?? Experience with key-value data stores like Redis and/or Memcached
?? At least five (5) years of professional experience as a full stack developer.
?? Experience building products with agile/lean approaches.
?? Must have a Github profile.
?? Experience working on both front-end and back-end technologies
?? Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's/College Degree , any field.
?? At least 5 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
?? Applicants must be willing to work in Libis Quezon City.
?? Work From Home until further notice.

Job Title: Amazon PPC Expert - Remote Work (URGENT HIRING)
Job Description:
Job Description
We are looking to add an Amazon PPC Expert to our team who is proven to be a Data Scientist!

What is your primary responsibility?
--- Assist the CMO with PPC and Marketing Activities.

This includes the following tasks:
--- Should be knowledgeable with Helium 10, Seller Tools, etc.
--- Optimize product listings via intensive keyword research
--- Optimize AMS, PPC, Sponsored product campaigns with various methods
--- Obtain a deep understanding of each product in the catalogue
--- Plan, develop, and implement comprehensive strategies to increase sales, visibility, brand recognition and drive sales across Amazon sponsored ads
--- Report to the CMO

What makes you perfect for this position?
--- Well versed in all of the components of the Campaign Manager
---------- Different types of Campaigns
---------- Ad groups
---------- Bids
---------- Keywords/Negative Keywords
--- Basic understanding of PPC mechanics
---------- Adjusting bids
---------- Adding keywords/negative keywords
---------- Creating/uploading bulk files
---------- Making decisions based on Search Term Report data
--- Proficiency in Microsoft Excel IS A MUST specifically VLOOKUP functionality
--- 2-3 of years experience working as a PPC Specialist in an Amazon environment

Work From Home Set-Up & Work Schedule. Since this role is 100% remote, we require:
--- A stable internet service is a must. The primary internet should be cabled wired on either DSL or FIBER connection with a download/ upload minimum speed of 10 Mbps.
--- Should have a backup internet solution - LTE Mobile Data or Pocket WIFI
--- Willing to work night shift - US EST Hours
--- A desktop Computer or Laptop preferably with Intel i3 or equivalent processor, Windows 7 and above or MAC OSX OS, 4GB RAM
--- A good headset with extended microphone and noise cancellation is preferred
--- Good external or integrated webcam

What role will you play in our company?
--- As our Amazon PPC Specialist, you will be critical in "behind the scenes" tasks. We need you to be a Critical Thinker, organized, and have exceptional attention to detail. You will be a big contributor as we reach our goal of having "self-run" seller central accounts that need little maintenance. Your participation in our company is to help us complete tasks that directly affect the success of our clients. Our vision is to ALWAYS BRING VALUE to our Clients.

Please write us a message explaining your skill level with Microsoft Excel and Amazon Seller Central. Please do not forget to send a link to your CV and include your email, mobile number, and Skype ID.

We look forward to hearing from you & working with you!

Job Highlights
Competitive pay and benefits
Direct hire, full-time regular employment
Career growth with a global leader in cloud & technology services
Job Description
Office location: Remote work/Work-from-Home setup due to COVID-19 until further notice, but permanent office location is in BGC, Taguig.
Working hours: Rotating schedule (Mid-shift to Night shift)
Key Responsibilities:
Support the development of continuously evolving operational and financial models and methodologies, executing the quantitative analysis of the performance of our sales team, customers, prospects, partners, markets, and products/services.
Develop a deep understanding of sales metrics, reporting tools, and data structure in order to identify and drive resolution of issues, provide actionable intelligence with existing metrics or identify, develop, and propose new metrics, dashboards, scorecards or new tools
Develop relationships and processes with sales operations, sales, finance, partner, and other functional teams to identify and address reporting issues.
Maintain and develop financial tools or reports that align, and simplify, monthly business reviews, annual planning, and forecasting processes
Create WW financial and operational templates and processes to compile and standardize disparate information that drive standardized reporting and metrics tracking
Generate ad hoc and monthly recurring financial and operational performance analysis, based on the needs of the stakeholders
Create mechanisms that provide recommendations through ad hoc data retrieval and analysis
Create new tools and business processes that simplifies, standardizes and enables operational excellence
Must be comfortable working in a remote location supporting a global organization
Minimum Qualifications:
5+ years of data, functional or operational analysis, based on large volumes of data
BS/BA degree in Finance, Economics, Statistics, Business or similar
Must be proficient in Excel and be able to create and troubleshoot complex spreadsheets
Experience using ERP/CRM/Commission software, and various data warehouse systems
Ability to develop new ideas and creative solutions
Advanced problem-solving skills for difficult and complex issues
Preferred Qualifications
Experience communicating results to operations and business leaders

Job Description
Our client is a leading Australian company in the real estate industry. They are seeking a skilled Business Intelligence Analyst to create data-driven strategies that improve the operational processes of their own business as well as their clients?? businesses.  
You will collect data, maintain a data warehouse, develop analytics tools, and report back on your findings.  

 Responsibilities:

On a daily basis, your responsibilities include:
Researching, developing and implementing data-gathering methods for internal use and client benchmarking
Sorting and storing data for easy analysis  
Developing reports, data visualizations and dashboards to identify trends and gain insights
Maintaining and improving existing business intelligence reports, datasets, and tools  
Monitoring and analysing external information sources such as industry news, construction trends, and market/economic indicators  
Sharing findings and impact assessments with leadership on a regular basis  
Conducting custom market research based on strategic business needs  
Reporting back on your findings and suggesting solutions 
Collaborating with co-workers and management to implement improvements  
Evaluating the effectiveness of implemented strategies.
To apply ?? you must meet the below essential criteria:  
You must be available to work from Monday to Friday 8:30am ?? 5pm BRISBANE, Australia, time

Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Business Studies, or related field
Minimum 1-2 years of experience in a BA role, working with relational databases and/or data warehouses  
Demonstrated ability to transform data into insights using data analysis and visualization tools and techniques  
Working knowledge of Microsoft Access and Sequel Script
Experience with the ClicData Software Solution will be highly desirable
Excellent English language skills ?? both written and verbal. You must be able to effectively share and explain to management, the strategies and insights identified in your research

Job Description:
Job Description
Temporary work-from-home setup due to COVID. Office is located in McKinley, Taguig.
Candidates must be flexible with shifts (24/7 contact centre operations, rotational shifts depending on the business need).
Role Overview
Global Forecasting & Reporting Analyst is responsible for supporting all contact centres by providing accurate and timely forecasts for staff planning. They will closely and continuously monitor factors that may impact contact/order/order volume to make ongoing refinements to forecast models to react to changes in the business. They will also be responsible for reporting on global KPI performance; develop and maintain the necessary processes to accurately report on headcount and seating to support global resource planning.

Key Responsibilities
Develop forecasts for contact/order volume for the various Lines of Businesses, Markets and Channels supported by the CARE Centers
On a quarterly basis to support staffing models
On an annual basis to support fiscal year staff budgeting
Conduct ad hoc forecast adjustments inter-quarter due to unforeseen changes (e.g. promotional calendar updates, customer behaviour changes)
Develop and/or enhance processes to drive improvements in the accuracy of forecasts and the timeliness of delivery of forecasting information to relevant stakeholders
Manage relationships with key stakeholders to obtain critical inputs for forecasting such as promotions, product launches, new self-service tools, adjusted operating hours, etc.
Produce forecast accuracy reporting and analysis to provide insight on root causes for forecast variance
Assess the impact of new initiatives on contact/order forecasts and make updates as needed to the forecast
Maintain WFM reporting cubes and dashboards in partnership with Analytics group
Analyze KPI performance data and provide insights into reasons for significant variances
Create and publish weekly, monthly and quarterly global KPI performance reports
Process ad-hoc requests for WFM data that is not readily available in existing reports
Provide WFM consultation support on relevant BI or Analytics projects
Define and maintain processes to ensure the accurate data capture of headcount across all Centers
Develops and maintains accurate reporting of headcount data across all Centers
Performs other duties as required based on WFM skillset
Qualifications/Requirements
Bachelor??s degree in Business with a focus on Statistics or Computer Science or related fields, or at least 5+ years solid Workforce Management Forecasting experience (senior specialist capacity).
Experience in working with various forecasting techniques and delivering quality control across forecasting and analysis activities to ensure continuous improvement
Working knowledge of contact center operational management & workforce management methodologies and principles.
Ability to manipulate large volumes of data using MS Excel and create useful reports
Experience using MS SQL is desired
Sound analytical thinking with strong problem solving and decision-making skills, with emphasis on drawing inferences from data and strong attention to detail
Exemplary communication and presentation skills with strong business acumen to facilitate different business relationships across multiple locations
Demonstrated success in a competitive, high-performance, target-driven environment
Experience with creating reporting dashboards is a plus
Must be available to work any shift that falls within our operating hours which spans 24 hours, seven (7) days per week

Job Description
About the role:
As a Revenue Assurance Analyst, you will support the business on revenue maximization through ensuring that every customers billing is right based on contract or recent agreement. You are expected to ensure all audit points are driven to completion in a timely manner with all accurate findings and deliver results.
You will be responsible to continuously strengthen the control environment to effectively identify revenue leakage and fraud exposure. Also be expected to assist internal inquiries relating to contract interpretation, charges, and variations.
Job description:
End to End Assurance Controls Acquiring, loading, and analyzing of complicated data including data matching to link information currently residing in multiple legacy systems.
Controls vary from data integrity analysis, tracking and trending of usage information, customer and carrier rate/bill validation and matching of Costs to Revenue.
Managing high-lighted issues through to resolution including determining root causes for issues and design/implement changes to operational business processes and systems to minimize the risk of the issue occurring again and potential exposure to revenue leakage.
Internal Control Improvement Streamline and automate assurance processes and controls to minimize the end-user effort and maximize the timeliness and accuracy of the output.
Increase Assurance Control scope by following the Risk control matrix and looking at identifying issues and areas of potential revenue leakage and exposure in current business processes and/or systems.
Business Improvement Projects Run and/or assist on various improvement projects assigned to the team, such as process redesign, system improvements and new service reviews.
Job qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in business, finance, management, or similar business experience.
3 years of experience in Revenue Assurance or technical operational roles within a telecommunications service provider (or equivalent commercial business).
Advanced Excel and Intermediate SQL skills are essential.
Strong communication and presentation skills with ability to work through both high-level concepts and detail as appropriate.
Demonstrates ability to map multiple incongruent data sources into a cohesive and comprehensive analytical model to be used for detailed cost and revenue mapping and identification/correction of revenue/cost leakage points.
Focus and keen to details.
Strong experience in process improvement, internal audit, or consulting.
Experience in working with and managing a diverse set of stakeholders.
Demonstrates strong analytical skills in interpreting and trending business data to make recommendations for improvement and translate to business impact statements that affect revenue.
Uses rigorous logic and methods to solve difficult problems with effective solutions; probes
all prolific sources for answers; can see hidden problems; is excellent at honest analysis.
Solid understanding of customers business contract and invoice management concepts.
Work shift and schedule:
6:00am - 2:30pm only, Mondays to Fridays.
Fixed weekends off.

Job Description
Schedule: Shifting
Location: BGC Taguig
Job duties:
To work within a QA team to institute best practices and QA constituency on a variety of data products. The role will be responsible for developing and maintaining QA data processes across a broad spectrum of financial instruments. This is a hands-on role in the creation and execution of test and QA procedures. 
The QA analyst will be responsible for carrying out data quality checks and data validation across multi-asset instruments. The core objective is to reduce uncertainty, minimize risk and meet SLA requirements. This will entail being responsible for the following activities:
1. Designing Data queries:
a. Identifying, defining and creating data validation and QA queries across multi-asset instrument sets
b. Defining what will be tested, monitored and how

2. Carrying out and maintaining QA data parameters:
a. Executing, performing and monitoring manual and automated queries/parameters  based on the data query designs
b. Keeping clear records of all QA issues, providing updates to relevant teams on a daily and weekly report basis

3. Signing off areas of functionality:
a. Ensuring QA data parameters are signed off after test phase on initial setup and on any new content.
b. Provide clear information on the sign off to the QA manager, Product and Operations teams.
Person Specification
Knowledge
?? 3 to 5 years?? experience within a QA, data quality role.
?? Good understanding of QA processes
?? Exposure to issue management and bug lifecycle
?? Experience of writing and maintaining tests scripts
?? Solid excel experience
?? Familiarity with Windows environment and SQL, OMS
?? Strong background in functionality/behaviour testing with the ability to design automated data queries and data validation checks.
?? Experience working on market data or QA applications within the financial services sector; experience working on applications within capital markets  and fixed income preferred
?? Strong attention to detail
?? Ability to follow issues through to resolution
?? Can manage and prioritize tasks with a sense of urgency
?? Able to think creatively and propose options/solutions to challenges
